con:configuration.content: <Result> <Name>UK - England and Wales</Name> <Name>UK - Northern Ireland</Name> <Name>UK - Scotland</Name> <Name>United States</Name> </Result>

con:transfers.con:name: CountryCode

con:condition.con:name: Condition 1

con:config.con:expectedResult: World callendar shows the same date
World callendar shows the same date
